posts.post_title: T206 Sale ++ 18 "nice" raw commons // all sold
posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine 
“I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.

PM OK but much prefer:

Correspondence to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

All Sweet Caporals are factory 30, unless noted.  I don't believe any to be trimmed, but that's just my opinion.

*** All sold ***

Not sure what the fastest BST transaction record is .... but this has to be close ..... :rolleyes:
